name: Shanxi Xiangkuang Huipo Coal Mine

The Shanxi Xiangkuang Huipo Coal Mine is located in the village of Nantianzhang, Guhan Town, Xiangyuan County, Changzhi City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Xiangkuang Huipo Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Shanxi Xiangkuang Huipo Coal Industry Co Ltd operates the mine, which is fully owned by Shanxi Xiangkuang Group Co Ltd.
